title: Creating ranked team (gold+)
body:
Hi guys, 

Looking to make a friendly team of 5-10 that we can leisurely play ranked 5s together. If the group gets big, we can constantly rotate and/or play games whenever a 5 is on. 

Currently looking for all positions so just list what and where you wanna play. 

Would be preferable if people were ongoing and friendly and not a 12 yr old behind a computer.

replies.body:
Hey Kezzza
I'm Gold 2 can play all roles but prefer support {{champion:412}} 
Private message me.
Thanks!!
ADC main was plat but currently high silver but expect a weekend marathon this weekend just to show people I'm not bad but I just really dislike solo queue

Hey there
ADC/Jung/Mid are my pref roles pretty much can play all the top ADCs, Jarv, Lee and Vi mostly for jung and mid pretty much all the strong mids at the moment
im gold 4, was gold last season and season before and during pre season was plat
